text:
Yes i totally understand!

When i meet a large group of people i just get really anxious, so its better for me to start from small groups and then eventually meet more and more people. Yes i do get nervous because when you are talking to all of them, they just stare and look at you, and i find it very uncomfortable but hopefully I'll get over it:joy:


I have thought about working in films as an actress, but i don't really know the best way to get there, because its such a competitive industry. 
Wow your brother also has a cool job!
I think it runs in your family having nice jobs! Hahaha!
